ORDER BY SPACE_READ DESC
ORDER BY SPACE_PRI
ORDER BY SPACE_ID DESC
ORDER BY SPACE_ID DESC
) AS RNUM, AA.* FROM( SELECT SPACE_ID, SPACE_TITLE, SPACE_USE, SPACE_IMG, SPACE_POS, SPACE_SIZE, SPACE_PRI, SPACE_READ FROM SPACE_LIST WHERE SPACE_HOLD = 'N' AND SPACE_DEL_GB = 'N' )AA

SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(
ORDER BY SPACE_READ DESC
ORDER BY SPACE_PRI
ORDER BY SPACE_ID DESC
ORDER BY SPACE_ID DESC
) AS RNUM, AA.* FROM(
SELECT SPACE_ID, SPACE_TITLE, SPACE_USE, SPACE_IMG, SPACE_POS, SPACE_SIZE, SPACE_PRI, SPACE_READ FROM ( SELECT S.* FROM ( SELECT SPACE_ID FROM SRES_DATE S WHERE S.SRES_DATE BETWEEN #{START_DATE} AND #{END_DATE}) D LEFT JOIN SPACE_LIST S ON S.SPACE_ID = D.SPACE_ID WHERE S.SPACE_HOLD = 'N' AND SPACE_DEL_GB = 'N' ) UNION SELECT SPACE_ID, SPACE_TITLE, SPACE_USE, SPACE_IMG, SPACE_POS, SPACE_SIZE, SPACE_PRI, SPACE_READ FROM ( SELECT SL.* FROM ( SELECT SPACE_ID FROM SRES_DAY UNPIVOT ( PRI FOR DAY IN (SRES_MON,SRES_TUE,SRES_WED,SRES_THU,SRES_FRI,SRES_SAT,SRES_SUN) ) WHERE PRI > 0
AND DAY IN
#{item}
) SDAY INNER JOIN SPACE_LIST SL ON SL.SPACE_ID = SDAY.SPACE_ID ) )AA
AND SPACE_USE LIKE '%${USE}%'
AND SPACE_POS LIKE '%${POS}%'
AND SPACE_SIZE <= TO_NUMBER(${SIZE})
AND SPACE_TITLE LIKE '%${TITLE}%'
SELECT SPACE_ID FROM LIKE_LIST WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE_LIST SET SPACE_READ = SPACE_READ + 1 WHERE SPACE_ID = ${SPACE_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_NUM DESC) RNUM, S.* FROM SPACE_QNA_LIST S WHERE SPACE_ID = #{SPACE_ID} AND QNA_DEL = 'N'
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC) RNUM, USER_ID, REPLY_NUM, REPLY_TITLE, REPLY_CNT, REPLY_CMT, REPLY_IMG, REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY_LIST WHERE SPACE_ID=#{SPACE_ID} AND REPLY_DEL = 'N'
SELECT SPACE_RES_TYPE FROM SPACE_LIST WHERE SPACE_ID = #{SPACE_ID}

SELECT RES_APPLY_DATE FROM RES_LIST WHERE RES_SPACE_ID = #{SPACE_ID}

mapper.update:
MERGE INTO LIKE_LIST L USING DUAL ON (L.SPACE_ID = ${SPACE_ID} AND L.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
L.DUMMY='X'
DELETE
L.SPACE_ID = ${SPACE_ID}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (L.USER_ID, L.SPACE_ID) VALUES (#{USER_ID},${SPACE_ID})
